name: Multiple Views of the same Geographical Point #3
description:
In a city in which the multiple faces and possibilities of experiencing immediate reality are combined into a wealth of information and different peaks of perception, for this reason this work is made to be visited and contemplated in its multiple faces, forming an infinite figure that rotates in the block chain representing with collective experiences in the city that connect with the daily life of those who inhabit the urban space
Bogota Colombia
2021
KOZ
